name: Heartless Giant
desc: "Quake" DMG is considered as Follow-up ATK DMG. After a character launches Follow-up ATKs, all allies gain 1 "Mechacore Component" stack, up to 77 stack(s). After a character with a Shield is attacked, consumes all of their "Mechacore Component" to deal 7 instances(s) of random-Type "Quake" DMG equal to 177% of the current Shield Effect. Every stack consumed increases this DMG by 7%.
